cloudServicesJSON.tag: Key Features of AWS Consulting Services

keyFeatures.title: Managed Services
keyFeatures.description: Deployment and configuration of applications, application performance monitoring, resolution of AWS-related incidents, and backup and disaster recovery.

keyFeatures.title: Advisory Services
keyFeatures.description: Resource usage & billing optimization, application architecture validation and consulting, general consulting and query resolutions, and auto-scaling implementation.

keyFeatures.title: Operations and Reports
keyFeatures.description: Monthly reports, quarterly reviews, and customer scorecards.

keyFeatures.title: Enhanced Support
keyFeatures.description: Executive escalation, enhanced TAM SLA, and customer advocate.

keyFeatures.title: Cost and Usage Tracking
keyFeatures.description: Cost and usage break-up of each AWS asset level as well as group level.

keyFeatures.title: Recommendations
keyFeatures.description: Cost-saving, high availability, auto-scaling, and asset optimization recommendations.
